summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of the City of Seattle, in the aggregate sum of Three Hundred Seventy Thousand ($370,000.00) Dollars for the purpose of providing funds for the construction of a bridge for the City of Seattle, across Lake Union along the line of Eastlake Avenue produced northeasterly, being part of Five Hundred Forty-five Thousand ($545,00.00) Dollars, bonds authorized at an election held in said city March 2, 1915, and directing the issuance of bonds in the sum of Three Hundred Seventy Thousand ($370,000.00) Dollars and the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
